name: Element Fission
storyline:
Lead the Elemons and bring hope to the unhappy! As a rookie agent in the Bureau of Abnormal Emotions, you’ll dive into emotional anomaly incidents unfolding across the globe.

With each case you solve, the hidden truths of the world begin to unravel. As chaos looms, your choices will shape the fate of those around you—will you be able to restore balance?
summary:
Element Fission is a turn-based strategy game where players take on the role of an agent in the Bureau of Abnormal Emotions. Tasked with investigating emotional anomaly incidents worldwide, gradually uncover hidden truths while navigating various story-driven events.

The game offers multiple battle modes, including asynchronous, real-time, and team-based competitions, allowing for diverse strategic experiences. Engage in combat in PvE or PvP modes, assembling and leading teams of unique characters known as "elemons" to tackle challenges and opponents.
